thread.title: Justice Dept: Did Delta, 3 other major airlines collude to drive up prices?
thread.title_full: Justice Dept: Did Delta, 3 other major airlines collude to drive up prices?

author: Carla Caldwell
title: Justice Dept: Did Delta, 3 other major airlines collude to drive up prices?
text:
Delta confirmed the airline has received “a civil investigative demand” and is cooperating with Department of Justice, Atlanta Business Chronicle broadcast partner WXIA-TV reported early Thursday. The federal agency wants copies of communications airlines had with each other, analysts and shareholders.. A United Airlines spokesperson told CNN “ we are complying with their requests." The U.S airlines' main trade group, Airlines for America, denied any effort to drive up costs and said member airlines compete every day. Airline stocks fell sharply Wednesday following news of the probe, which was first reported earlier Wednesday by the Associated Press. The stocks recovered somewhat, with shares of the four biggest carriers ending down by 1.4 percent to 2.8 percent, The Wall Street Journal reported.
